sentences.en: And many strokes , though with a little axe , hew down and fell the hardest - timbered oak.
sentences.cn: 最坚硬的橡木, 也终会在小斧的无数次劈砍中倒下.

sentences.en: Experimental results show that the hew algorithm has satisfied convergent probability and convergent speed.
sentences.cn: 仿真实验结果表明与现有方法相比,新方法具有更好的收敛概率和收敛速度.

sentences.en: He knew better than to attempt to hew rocks with razor.
sentences.cn: 他知道刀片不能劈石头.

sentences.en: Hew not too high lest the chips fall in thine eye.
sentences.cn: 伐木时不要砍得太高,否则木屑会跑入你的眼睛. (勿好高骛远,应实事求事.)

sentences.en: Hew out of the West branch manager Huang said.
sentences.cn: 满堂红西槎分店黄店长如是说.

sentences.en: I want to hew out a career for myself.
sentences.cn: 我想要艰苦地创一番事业.

sentences.en: It is your job to comport yourself humbly and to consistently hew to your moral ideals.
sentences.cn: 这是你的职责:谦逊地把持自己并坚守你的道德理想.

sentences.en: They hew it out of the rock.
Throughout the weekend, Dr. Hew Len gave us tools for transformation, tools that totally defy intellectualism.
sentences.cn: 整个周末, 贺博士给了我们不少工具去转化, 都是些针对主知主义的工具.

sentences.en: Tom made up his mind to hew a way for himself to distinction through the ranks.
sentences.cn: 汤姆下决心要从下层起跻身于名流.

sentences.en: You must hew to the rules of the game, or it wouldn't be named game.
sentences.cn: 你得遵守比赛的规则, 否则就称不上比赛了.

trans.tran_cn: (Hew)人名；(英)休；(东南亚国家华语)丘

trans.tran_en: to cut something with a cutting tool

trans.tran_cn: （用斧、刀等）砍、劈，砍成，劈出，开辟
